response.answer_text: Ruby Lalli has given the correct answer for US usage. In the UK we would write, “four thousand, nine hundred and seventy nine, point three four”. Note, if this was a sum of money, we would mention the currency, eg ‘four thousand, nine hundred and seventy nine pounds/dollars, 34 pence/cents’.
